format: A data frame with 795 observations on the following 2 variables.
title: gss_wordsum_class
description:
Description
A data frame containing data from the General Social Survey.

parameters.wordsum: A vocabulary score calculated based on a ten question vocabulary test, where a higher score means better vocabulary. Scores range from 1 to 10.
parameters.class: Self-identified social class has 4 levels: lower, working, middle, and upper class.
